RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 16300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEHRIG sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the turn, shook clear and widened through the stretch under right handed urging to win as much the best. PAT DADDY never far back, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then was no match for the winner. CUGINE trailed into the stretch and passed tiring rivals late outside. DIAMONDS ENJOY broke in front, had a brief early lead, pressed the pace into the turn and weakened in the stretch. UHAVETOBEKITTENME pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead inside, set pace, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Cugine
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move, inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds Enjoy
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, pressed 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 17. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NO BANG NO BOOM (IRE) stalked the pace along the inside for a half, shifted outside the leader to the four path entering the stretch, made the lead inside the furlong marker under right handed urging and edged clear late under a strong hand ride. JOHNNY U away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. CALL WEST trailed into the stretch, swung out to the seven path and had a mild late rally. MR. TRIPLEDOUBLE with the second flight two wide, moved closer three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. POWERFUL MOON pressed the pace two wide into the turn, had speed into the stretch then flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late gain outside 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny U
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: No Bang No Boom (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out 4path, late lead, 2wide, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide turn, flattened out stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Tripledouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAND DEAL drifted in from the four to the two paths entering the first turn, was unhurried, closed willingly in the five into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew clear under strong handling. ST. LUKES was in tight along the rail entering the first turn causing his jockey to check hard, settled well back early, swung wide into the stretch, rallied in the six path and finished clear for second. EL SICARIO broke in front and quickly opened a daylight lead, set the pace into the stretch then weakened. AT THE BEACH was pulled repeatedly for the first sixteenth of a mile then no threat. STRONG AGAIN chased the early pace and was through after a half. THE RIDER OF ST. LUKES LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE ENTERING THE FIRST TURN. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED GRAND DEAL AND PLACED HIM SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: At the Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled repeatedly start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: St. Lukes
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight 7/8pole, checked, rallied for 2nd outside, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in 4-2paths 7/8p, closed willingly, 5path, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Again
ENTRY.OWNER: Prostar 10 Stables Inc and The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: El Sicario
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, clear lead, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD ON YA away alertly, set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from the runner up entering the stretch and drew off under brisk handling. WOODLAND WALK chased the winner for a half, loomed boldly outside that one at the top of the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. DIVINE LEADER stalked the pace along the inside and faded in the stretch. WHISTLEWHILEYOUMOW trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Good On Ya
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, repulsed bid top stretch, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Leader
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, loomed boldly 2 wide top stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Whistlewhileyoumow
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 21400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRIKE ONE sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside, shook clear in upper stretch and prevailed under strong handling. UNBRIDLED CAUSE bore in bumping COUNTRY RUCKUS at the start, was unhurried, saved ground through the turn then closed rapidly two wide through deep stretch and finished second best. PRIMITIVO with the second flight two wide, finished with good courage three wide. COUNTRY RUCKUS was bumped at the start, had a brief early lead, prompted the pace into the stretch then was outfinished. IMA BELIEVER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Strike One
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew clear, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStarFarm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Country Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, brief early lead, pressed 2w, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, saved ground, closed fast, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Believer
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Primitivo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, finished well, 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YEARS AGO pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead at the top of the stretch then finished full of run under brisk handling to win going away. PROSPECTIVE FORUM broke inward bumping MAGICGIRL at the start, made the lead soon thereafter, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. MAGICGIRL was bumped at the start, trailed into the stretch and found er best stride late in the four path. JEN'S BATTLE had good early speed, moved up along the rail into the turn, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then was outfinished. SIERRA DIAMOND had good early speed then faded. QUEENOFCATNIPHILL hopped hitting the gate at the start and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Jen's Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Magicgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, best stride late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Prospective Forum
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, bumped start, set pace top lane, no match winner

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, took over 3/16pole, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofcatniphill
ENTRY.OWNER: Kahlden Lawrence A and Wiener Brett
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 21400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 17, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. C laiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENNY SHOTS stalked the pace into the stretch, rallied three wide under right handed urging to make the lead near the furlong marker, edged clear under a strong hand ride and lasted. HIGH FIRE unhurried inside, drifted to the six path at the top of the stretch, closed fast and just missed. EXACTITUDE alternated in setting and pressing the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. THE DEVIL'S DREAM battled for the lead along the inside until deep stretch then weakened. CATABOUT failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Exactitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, right urging, drew clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: High Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Jones Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, drifted 6path top lane, closed fast, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 32500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 17 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) ( Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECRET FIX broke sharply, dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch, shook clear under right then left handed urging and prevailed under strong handling. PASSIONFORTREASURE trailed early, closed willingly two wide through the stretch in the four path and finished second best. PULPIT'S PURRFECT stalked the pace three wide and finished with good courage. BAREBACK FUN battled with the winner along the inside for a half then weakened. HASTY LADY had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Passionfortreasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Bareback Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside half, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Hasty Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Pulpit's Purrfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Fix
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 2 wide, shook clear, driving,
